Text.Name: ChangeZhen
Text.Tip: Change a formation to cover exposed auxiliaries.

Text.Name: CancelZhen
Text.Tip: Disbands the formation. After disbanding a formation, some time must pass before a new formation can be formed.

Text.Name: JointJian
Text.Tip: Everyone combines their Qi in order to control the formation pillar's artifact and refill it with Qi, drastically boosting the Artifact Power according to the formation's Sword Mastery Power Bonus. Everyone in the formation shares the Qi cost.

Text.Name: JointSkill
Text.Tip: Everyone combines their Qi in order to help the formation pillar cast the next spell, boosting its power. The power increase is related to the formation's Spell Power Bonus. Everyone in the formation shares the Qi cost.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_RevealZhen1
Text.Tip: Follows the pattern of the Stone Sentinel Maze to attack the weak points of the target formation. Lowers its stability and has a chance of exposing its auxhilaries.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_RevealZhen2
Text.Tip: Deals a huge amount of Qi damage to the target.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_ZhenShield1
Text.Tip: Create a domain spanning a 5-meter radius around the target point and use the formation's Qi to defend.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_ZhenShield2
Text.Tip: Create a domain spanning a 12-meter radius around the target point and use the formation's Qi to defend.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_ZhenArea1
Text.Tip: Create a domain spanning an 8-meter radius around the target point. Fertilizes the soil inside and increases the natural resilience of allied characters.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_ZhenArea2
Text.Tip: Create a domain spanning an 8-meter radius around the target point. Increases the mental state, mood, cultivation speed of allied characters inside the domain.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_JointJian1
Text.Tip: Everyone combines their Qi in order to control the formation pillar's artifact and refill it with Qi, drastically boosting the Artifact Power according to the formation's Sword Mastery Power Bonus. Everyone in the formation shares the Qi cost.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_JointSkill1
Text.Tip: Everyone combines their Qi in order to help the formation pillar cast the next spell, boosting its power. The power increase is related to the formation's Spell Power Bonus. Everyone in the formation shares the Qi cost.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_Stability1
Text.Tip: Deals a huge amount of damage to the enemy's formation stability.

Text.Name: FightSkill_Zhen_ZhuXian
Text.Tip: After a short delay, deals a huge amount of Qi damage to enemies within a 12-meter radius of the target point.
